Title: Provides that the Elmsford fire department and the Hastings-on-Hudson fire department may each establish fees and charges for emergency services
Summary: Provides that the Elmsford fire department and the Hastings-on-Hudson fire department may each establish fees and charges for emergency services.
LawCode: Amd §§209-b & 122-b, Gen Muni L; amd §184, Town L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the town law, in relation to authorizing fees and charges for emergency medical services
